Question: Hexhive.co.ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Hexhive.co.ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight:

- Introducing the new Hexhive Smart Home Security System
- Features advanced AI technology for enhanced threat detection
- Includes 24/7 monitoring and real-time alerts
- Integrates with smart home devices for seamless control
- Offers easy setup and user-friendly mobile app for remote access
- Provides high-definition video recording and two-way audio communication
Summary_cn:
Hexhive有限公司

CES 2024产品亮点：

- 推出全新的Hexhive智能家居安全系统
- 具有先进的AI技术，提升威胁检测能力
- 提供全天候监控和实时警报
- 可与智能家居设备集成，实现无缝控制
- 提供简单设置和用户友好的手机应用，用于远程访问
- 提供高清视频录制和双向音频通信
